job_details.Vacaturetitel: Data Architect - Principal Machine Learning Engineer (all genders)
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Set standards for engineering excellence and act as the technical guide, providing guidance to both product and technical colleagues within the team.
     * Co-represent the Tribe's engineering at the highest levels (CTO, CPO conversations)
     * Own architectural decisions in the tribe and influence data architecture in the wider organization.
     * Being a role model for a specific model / process / language / algorithm / product for engineers in the team and in the chapter.
     * Work closely with engineers and data scientists in the organization in order to determine needs for new software, platforms and applications both in functional and non-functional requirements.
     * Alignment with engineering and data managers on overall technical vision for involved squads.
     * Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains.
     * Pay attention to system integration, sustainability and feasibility with an eye on the overall list of services and how new ones can integrate within the overall system.
     * Manage all phases of technology development.
     * Oversee and supervise the work of the development teams and guide engineers in data engineering and machine learning engineering chapters.
     * Have an eye on Pull Requests and suggest improvements via objective input backed up with resources to help guide the engineers for better quality in the future.
     * Suggest and implement solutions (either partially like spikes or via POCs) for process improvement.
     * Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines.
     * Being a technical representative of the data organization for internal and external events.
job_details.full_text:
Data Architect - Principal Machine Learning Engineer (all genders)

* Set standards for engineering excellence and act as the technical guide, providing guidance to both product and technical colleagues within the team.
     * Co-represent the Tribe's engineering at the highest levels (CTO, CPO conversations)
     * Own architectural decisions in the tribe and influence data architecture in the wider organization.
     * Being a role model for a specific model / process / language / algorithm / product for engineers in the team and in the chapter.
     * Work closely with engineers and data scientists in the organization in order to determine needs for new software, platforms and applications both in functional and non-functional requirements.
     * Alignment with engineering and data managers on overall technical vision for involved squads.
     * Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains.
     * Pay attention to system integration, sustainability and feasibility with an eye on the overall list of services and how new ones can integrate within the overall system.
     * Manage all phases of technology development.
     * Oversee and supervise the work of the development teams and guide engineers in data engineering and machine learning engineering chapters.
     * Have an eye on Pull Requests and suggest improvements via objective input backed up with resources to help guide the engineers for better quality in the future.
     * Suggest and implement solutions (either partially like spikes or via POCs) for process improvement.
     * Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines.
     * Being a technical representative of the data organization for internal and external events.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on architectural decisions, technical leadership, and guiding engineering teams rather than hands-on development or implementation of specific ML/GenAI models or applications. While it mentions 'Machine Learning Engineering domains', the core responsibilities lean towards high-level strategy and oversight, making it less of a direct ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer role.

phrases: Set standards for engineering excellence and act as the technical guide, providing guidance to both product and technical colleagues within the team.
Co-represent the Tribe's engineering at the highest levels (CTO, CPO conversations)
Own architectural decisions in the tribe and influence data architecture in the wider organization.
Work closely with engineers and data scientists in the organization in order to determine needs for new software, platforms and applications both in functional and non-functional requirements.
Alignment with engineering and data managers on overall technical vision for involved squads.
Pay attention to system integration, sustainability and feasibility with an eye on the overall list of services and how new ones can integrate within the overall system.
Being a technical representative of the data organization for internal and external events.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight understanding business needs, translating them into technical requirements, aligning technical vision with organizational goals, and representing the technical domain externally.

phrases: Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains.
Manage all phases of technology development.
Suggest and implement solutions (either partially like spikes or via POCs) for process improvement.
Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves the development and implementation of technical specifications, managing development phases, and ensuring adherence to quality and scalability, which are core to software development, albeit at a strategic level here.

phrases: Oversee and supervise the work of the development teams and guide engineers in data engineering and machine learning engineering chapters.
Have an eye on Pull Requests and suggest improvements via objective input backed up with resources to help guide the engineers for better quality in the future.
Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines.
job_tasks.justification: The oversight of development teams, guidance on code quality (Pull Requests), and adherence to operational guidelines like security and scalability touch upon the principles of MLOps and production readiness.
